me.ryandw11.ultrabar.api

Class BossBarBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ryandw11.ultrabar.api.BossBarBuilder

  • public class BossBarBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A clean way to create automatic countdown boss bars.

    • Constructor Summary

      The api for building bossbars.

        public BossBarBuilder setTime(int time)
        Set the time of the boss bar.

        This is only needed if you build a live bar via build().

        Parameters:
        time - The time the boss bar should last. (In Seconds)

        public BossBarBuilder setPlayerCollection(java.util.Collection<org.bukkit.entity.Player> players)
        Set a collection of players.

        If a the permission string does not equal null, then only the players with the specified permission will get added.

        Parameters:
        players - The collection of players.
        Returns:
        The boss bar builder.

        Parameters:

      • setTracked

        public BossBarBuilder setTracked(boolean value)
        Set if the boss bar is tracked.

        Tracked means that UltraBar will keep track of it in its internal system and manage it.

        Tracked bars are also automatically added to players on join if both UBossBar.isPublicBar() and UBossBar.checkPlayerConditions(Player) are true.

        Parameters:
        value - If the bar should be tracked.
        Returns:
        The boss bar builder

      • isOnePlayer

        public boolean isOnePlayer()
        If there is only one player associated with the bar.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getPublicBar

        public BossBarBuilder setPermission(java.lang.String permission)
        Sets the permission for the bossbar.

        If the player list was already set, then players without the permission are removed.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The boss bar builder.
